product_type.confidence: Confidence level in product type identification (0.0 - 1.0)

manufacturer_name.confidence: Confidence level in manufacturer name identification (0.0 - 1.0)

manufacturer_product_reference.value: Reference number or code used by the manufacturer for the product (String)
manufacturer_product_reference.confidence: Confidence level in the accuracy of the identified manufacturer product reference (0.0 - 1.0)

product_model_name.confidence: Confidence level in model name identification (0.0 - 1.0)

product_unit_price.value: Price per unit of the product including taxes, expressed as a float using a decimal point (String)
product_unit_price.confidence: Confidence level in the accuracy of the identified unit price (0.0 - 1.0)

quantity_purchased.value: Number of units of the product purchased (String)
quantity_purchased.confidence: Confidence level in the accuracy of the identified quantity purchased (0.0 - 1.0)

seller_product_reference.value: Reference number or code used by the seller for the product (String)
seller_product_reference.confidence: Confidence level in the accuracy of the identified seller product reference (0.0 - 1.0)

seller_warranty_valid_until.value: Expiry date of the product's warranty as provided by the seller or converted from the provided purchase date and duration, YYYY-MM-DD format (String)
seller_warranty_valid_until.confidence: Confidence level in the accuracy of the identified warranty validity date (0.0 - 1.0)

product_short_description.value: Brief description of the product including brand, model name, manufacturer reference, color, capacity, key features and characteristics (String)
product_short_description.confidence: Confidence level in the accuracy of the provided product description (0.0 - 1.0)

product_color.confidence: Confidence level in the color identification (0.0 - 1.0)

product_ean.value: European Article Number, a 13-digit barcoding standard (String)

tax_type.value: Type of tax applied, e.g., VAT, GST (String)
tax_type.confidence: Confidence level in the accuracy of the identified tax type (0.0 - 1.0)

tax_amount.value: Total amount of tax applied, expressed as a float using a decimal point (String)
tax_amount.confidence: Confidence level in the accuracy of the identified tax amount (0.0 - 1.0)

tax_percentage.value: Percentage of tax applied expressed as an integer (String)
tax_percentage.confidence: Confidence level in the accuracy of the identified tax percentage (0.0 - 1.0)

invoice_date.value: Date when the invoice was issued, YYYY-MM-DD format (String)
invoice_date.confidence: Confidence level in the accuracy of the identified invoice date (0.0 - 1.0)

invoice_number.confidence: Confidence level in the accuracy of the identified invoice number (0.0 - 1.0)

invoice_total.value: Total amount listed on the invoice, expressed as a float using a decimal point (String)
invoice_total.confidence: Confidence level in the accuracy of the identified invoice total (0.0 - 1.0)

currency.value: Currency code of the currency used in the invoice, e.g., USD, EUR (String)
currency.confidence: Confidence level in the accuracy of the identified currency (0.0 - 1.0)

order_date.value: Date when the order was placed, YYYY-MM-DD format (String)
order_date.confidence: Confidence level in the accuracy of the identified order date (0.0 - 1.0)

order_number.confidence: Confidence level in the accuracy of the identified order number (0.0 - 1.0)

purchaser_gender.value: Gender of the purchaser: Female or Male (String)
purchaser_gender.confidence: Confidence level in the accuracy of the identified purchaser gender (0.0 - 1.0)

purchaser_name.confidence: Confidence level in the accuracy of the identified purchaser name (0.0 - 1.0)

purchaser_address.confidence: Confidence level in the accuracy of the identified purchaser address (0.0 - 1.0)

seller_name.value: Name of the seller or the company selling the product (String)
seller_name.confidence: Confidence level in the accuracy of the identified seller name (0.0 - 1.0)

seller_siren.value: Système d'Identification du Répertoire des Entreprises number of the seller, if applicable (String)
seller_siren.confidence: Confidence level in the accuracy of the identified seller name (0.0 - 1.0)

seller_siret.value: Système d'Identification du Répertoire des Établissements number of the seller, if applicable (String)
seller_siret.confidence: Confidence level in the accuracy of the identified seller address (0.0 - 1.0)

seller_vat_number.value: Value Added Tax number of the seller (String)

seller_address.confidence: Confidence level in the accuracy of the identified seller address (0.0 - 1.0)

seller_url.value: Website URL of the seller, if available (String)

picture_quality.value: Numeric value representing the quality of the invoice image, e.g., resolution, clarity (0.0 - 1.0)
